response.answer_text: The display devices are output devices to display the information in visual form by means of various types of display systems. In digital instruments, the output device of the instrument indicates the value of measured quantity using the digital display device. This digital display device may receive the digital information in any form but it converts the information in decimal form. The digital display device indicates the value in decimal digits directly. LEDs are most commonly used in digital displays for displaying alphanumeric characters. The LEDs have advantages such as low voltage, long life, high reliability, low cost, fast switching characteristics, etc. To know more click https://electronicsclub.co.in/display-devices/

Display Devices… In general the display devices are the output devices which are used to show or view the results of our works like Mobile Screen and Computer Monitor. But in the emerging technological world we have lots and lots of display devices in our real life. The Major Types are, Segment displaysFull-area 2-dimensional displaysThree-dimensionalMechanical typesThe above are some major display devices, and we have lot of sub categories in those types.
